39  public function formConfig($hasHeader = true) {
40  global $config;
41  if ($hasHeader === true) {
42  $this->getHeader ( "config" );
43  }
44  $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getConfigDataForm ( $config, $hasHeader );
45  $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
46  $this->loadView ( $this->_getFiles ()->getViewConfigForm () );
47  }
48 
49  public function _config() {
50  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
51  echo $this->_getAdminViewer ()->getConfigDataElement ( $config );
52  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
53  }
54 
55  public function submitConfig($partial = true) {
56  $result = Startup::getConfig ();
57  $postValues = $_POST;
58  if ($partial !== true) {
59  if (isset ( $postValues ["lbl-ck-div-de-database-input-cache"] )) {
60  unset ( $postValues ["lbl-ck-div-de-database-input-cache"] );
61  if (! (isset ( $postValues ["database-cache"] ) && UString::isNotNull ( $postValues ["database-cache"] ))) {
62  $postValues ["database-cache"] = false;
63  }
64  } else {
65  $postValues ["database-cache"] = false;
66  }
67  $postValues ["debug"] = isset ( $postValues ["debug"] );
68  $postValues ["test"] = isset ( $postValues ["test"] );
69  $postValues ["templateEngineOptions-cache"] = isset ( $postValues ["templateEngineOptions-cache"] );
70  }
71  foreach ( $postValues as $key => $value ) {
72  if (strpos ( $key, "-" ) === false) {
73  $result [$key] = $value;
74  } else {
75  list ( $k1, $k2 ) = explode ( "-", $key );
76  if (! isset ( $result [$k1] )) {
77  $result [$k1] = [ ];
78  }
79  $result [$k1] [$k2] = $value;
80  }
81  }
82  $content = "<?php\nreturn " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $result, "array", 1, true ) . ";";
83  if (CodeUtils::isValidCode ( $content )) {
84  if (Startup::saveConfig ( $content )) {
85  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "The configuration file has been successfully modified!", "positive", "check square", null, "msgConfig" );
86  } else {
87  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Impossible to write the configuration file.", "negative", "warning circle", null, "msgConfig" );
88  }
89  } else {
90  $this->showSimpleMessage ( "Your configuration contains errors.<br>The configuration file has not been saved.", "negative", "warning circle", null, "msgConfig" );
91  }
92 
93  $config = Startup::reloadConfig ();
94  if ($partial == "check") {
95  if (isset ( $config ["database"] ["dbName"] )) {
96  Startup::reloadServices ();
97  }
98  $this->models ( true );
99  } else {
100  $this->config ( false );
101  }
102  }
103 
104  protected function _checkCondition($callback) {
105  if (URequest::isPost ()) {
106  $result = [ ];
107  UResponse::asJSON ();
108  $value = $_POST ["_value"];
109  $result ["result"] = $callback ( $value );
110  echo json_encode ( $result );
111  }
112  }
113 
114  public function _checkArray() {
115  $this->_checkCondition ( function ($value) {
116  try {
117  $array = eval ( "return " . $value . ";" );
118  return is_array ( $array );
119  } catch ( \ParseError $e ) {
120  return false;
121  }
122  } );
123  }
124 
125  public function _checkDirectory() {
126  $folder = URequest::post ( "_ruleValue" );
127  $this->_checkCondition ( function ($value) use ($folder) {
128  $base = Startup::getApplicationDir ();
129  return file_exists ( $base . \DS . $folder . \DS . $value );
130  } );
131  }
132 
133  public function _checkClass() {
134  $parent = URequest::post ( "_ruleValue" );
135  $this->_checkCondition ( function ($value) use ($parent) {
136  try {
137  $class = new \ReflectionClass ( $value );
138  return $class->isSubclassOf ( $parent );
139  } catch ( \ReflectionException $e ) {
140  return false;
141  }
142  } );
143  }
144 
145  private function convert_smart_quotes($string) {
146  $search = array (chr ( 145 ),chr ( 146 ),chr ( 147 ),chr ( 148 ),chr ( 151 ) );
147 
148  $replace = array ("'","'",'"','"','-' );
149 
150  return str_replace ( $search, $replace, $string );
151  }
152 
153  public function _checkDbStatus() {
154  $postValues = $_POST;
155  $connected = false;
156  $db = new Database ( $postValues ["database-type"], $postValues ["database-dbName"], $postValues ["database-serverName"], $postValues ["database-port"], $postValues ["database-user"], $postValues ["database-password"] );
157  try {
158  $db->_connect ();
159  $connected = $db->isConnected ();
160  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
161  $errorMsg = $e->getMessage ();
162  $msg = ((mb_detect_encoding ( $errorMsg, "UTF-8, ISO-8859-1, ISO-8859-15", "CP1252" )) !== "UTF-8") ? utf8_encode ( $this->convert_smart_quotes ( $errorMsg ) ) : ($errorMsg);
163  $connected = false;
164  }
165  $icon = "exclamation triangle red";
166  if ($connected) {
167  $icon = "check square green";
168  }
169  $icon = $this->jquery->semantic ()->htmlIcon ( "db-status", $icon );
170  if (isset ( $msg )) {
171  $icon->addPopup ( "Error", $msg );
172  } else {
173  $icon->addPopup ( "Success", "Connexion is ok!" );
174  }
175  $this->jquery->execAtLast ( '$("#db-status").popup("show");' );
176  echo $icon;
177  echo $this->jquery->compile ( $this->view );
178  }
179 }
